snippet: As part of a plan to improve the nutritional quality of the food it sells, Walmart said that it would begin placing a label with the words Great for You on its Great Value and Marketside food items.
abstract: Walmart announces standards to identify and label healthy foods it sells as part of its promise to improve the nutritional quality of its products; labels will bear the words Great for You on the retailer's store brand items, as well as on signs around fresh fruits and vegetable displays; Walmart will allow other brands to use the label without paying any licensing fee on products that are up to its standards and meet certain criteria; move acknowledges Walmart's influential role in the health of American families.
lead_paragraph: As part of a plan to improve the nutritional quality of the food it sells, Walmart said that it would begin placing a label with the words Great for You on its Great Value and Marketside food items.

headline.seo: Walmart to Add ‘Great for You’ Label to Healthy Foods
headline.print_headline: To Promote Healthier Food Choices, Walmart Adds Labels
